meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irreversible.
meanings.sent1: The irreversibilities of time passing make us cherish each moment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the irreversibilities of certain chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The irreversibilities of a cat chasing its own tail never fail to amuse me.
meanings.sent4: The irreversibilities of history remind us that some things can never be undone.
meanings.sent5: The irreversibilities of aging are evident in the changing seasons of life.

meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the irreversibilities of the different decisions we make.
meanings.sent2: She pondered the irreversibilities of various choices she had made in life.
meanings.sent3: The irreversibilities of multiple paths taken by ants fascinated the child.
meanings.sent4: The irreversibilities of countless mistakes taught him valuable lessons.
meanings.sent5: The irreversibilities of numerous opportunities missed haunted her dreams.
